categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Saaryu was an Imperial TIE pilot who was known to be an ace shooter. He was taking part in the Battle of Ottega to finish of Harkov's fleet that had defected to the Rebel Alliance. As the pilots were getting ready for the second stage of the battle, Saaryu was in a last minute exchange with fellow pilot Prakrii over their opinions of the Tractor beam's use in battle.
